name: UltraSharp 27-inch 4K Monitor
description: Experience stunning 4K resolution with this 27-inch Dell UltraSharp monitor. Perfect for designers, gamers, and professionals who need precise color accuracy and sharp details.

name: Alpha 7 IV Mirrorless Camera
description: Sony Alpha 7 IV is a full-frame mirrorless camera designed for professional photographers and videographers. Capture stunning images with advanced autofocus, 33MP sensor, and 4K video recording.

name: XPS 15 2025 Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 15 is a high-performance laptop featuring a 15.6-inch 4K OLED display, Intel Core i9 processor, and NVIDIA RTX graphics. Ideal for creative professionals, gaming, and multitasking.

name: Gaming Pro 32-inch Curved Monitor
description: Immerse yourself in gaming with Samsung's 32-inch curved monitor. With 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time, enjoy smooth gameplay and vivid colors.

name: EOS R6 II Mirrorless Camera
description: Canon EOS R6 II features a 24.2MP full-frame sensor, 4K 60fps video, and advanced autofocus. Perfect for professional photography and high-speed action shots.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch M2 Max
description: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch with M2 Max chip delivers unmatched performance for video editing, 3D rendering, and software development. Stunning Liquid Retina XDR display and long battery life.
